My vehicle had multiple issues suddenly arise, including a check engine light.  I called the dealership I purchased the vehicle from and they were not able to take my vehicle in for diagnostics for 4 weeks.  I was not comfortable driving my vehicle with a check engine light on for 4 weeks so I called this location.  Yogesh, the service manager, was extremely helpful and was able to get my vehicle in the same day.  They not only diagnosed the issues, but were also able to complete my yearly service on short notice.  I will definitely be bringing my vehicle to this location from now on.

Horrible experience. So called "service advisor" are there just there for their  9 to 5. They don't care about what kind service they provide you. I  was given the wrong information about my warranty by the service advisor, which would cover the cost of repair almost $10k.  I paid $200 for the diagnostics that just another waste of my money. Never to trust so called advisors.

Also, VW Canada is horrible, called their customers service, and when they call back just pretending that they can't hear you. I have request numerous time to speak with their manager but no a avil.  when I tried to get an answer regarding the warranty. Just horrible experience over all with this dealership and vw canada tele line. I won't shop at this dealer.

reviews.text:
We recently purchased a 2023 Toyota Highlander from Abbotsford Volkswagen.  We live in a rural town and were able to complete almost everything remotely, which is very beneficial when we don’t have much time to travel out of town.

Sanav was very responsive, easy to get ahold of, and answered all questions and requests we had prior to purchasing; all of which in a very timely manner. Sanav made the process so effortless & easy, & we would highly recommend purchasing a vehicle with him.

I leased a new car from Volkswagen Abbotsford yesterday . The sales staff, Louise(中国人)is pretty nice and responsible . And also the manager Mel, gave us a best deal than other dealer shops. Here, you can feel that customers are God's service. Although I live in Richmond, but I I'd rather drive this far to buy a car here because of their service and price.

My wife and I just bought a 2012 Toyota Highlander sport edition someone traded up with. Our salesman was Hardik.
First of all, he was extremely kind. Not pushy,  insistent or manipulative. He made us feel right at home. He took very good care of us the whole way through. Thanks Hardik! If you are looking for an honest and very pleasant person to help you out in buying a vehicle, he's definitely your guy! As well, I must say, Abbotsford Volkswagen as a whole has great staff, and a relaxing atmosphere. We would for sure do business there again. No question.

Mike & Rachel

I went in there last Saturday with no intention of buying a car but rather just to explore. I got greeted by this gentleman named Virinder on my way in. He was keen to know the purpose of why I was looking for a car and then he suggested Tiguan, the comfortline. We went out for a test drive and honestly, I liked the car. He helped me out explaining all the features and how strong the car was built up in a way that it wasn’t pushy. He helped me out with the pricing too and got me a good deal for R line as it looked better with black alloy wheels and everything.  Overall, I have the car with me for a week now after they got me approved for 0.99% APR for 60 months. Highly recommend them for their service and sportsmanship. Kudos to the entire team and especially, Virinder and his positive vibe which was also the reason I settled up finally for Tiguan. Great work team!

Super happy with our 2024 Taos Black Edition.  The corn flour blue is just awesome.  Vishal was amazing. If you want no pressure sales, he is your guy.  All up front, totally honest and he got us an amazing price for our trade. Much more than the dealer we bought the car from was willing to give us. All in all it was a great experience at Abbotsford Volkswagen. They even stayed open late for us.  Thanks to everyone.

reviews.text:
What do you do on a Saturday long weekend? Why not take a drive (in 2 hr traffic!) to Chilliwack Volkswagen.
We met with our salesman, Emilio - who was so patient and understanding with the traffic delay and meeting him in person, was an instant connection. He was knowledgeable and friendly and very sincere with addressing our needs and requests. We did end up trading our vehicle and driving away in an EV and even after leaving Emilio was available via text for any questions or follow up. We highly recommend him!
We are so happy with our purchase and so grateful to have met with Emilio and the Volkswagen team. Thank you!

Updated August 7 2024
Service Department has some challenges. I am disappointed. i was very frustrated when i first wrote this as I have to drive 40 minutes in each direction to bring my vehicle in for service.

I left my vehicle for a week so everything could get done. I rely on my vehicle as i use it for my business everyday.

I feel there Systems and Processes are lacking and because of that Customers are being lost and disappointed.

I dropped my vehicle off for 1 week to get service done and some recalls. I pick up my vehicle and the first thing i see is following.

Your service is overdue. Still am not sure if the service was done. Waiting for confirmation.

I got a phone call Monday July 29 last week saying vehicle was done as well as following.

Brake Dust Challenge
Did they take the rims off and check the brakes?
Ashton told me “ We called VW Canada and I talked to my service manager and there is nothing to do as your brakes are 100% there is nothing wrong with them.”

Emails with instructions to Service manager
I talked to Ashton I told him I had emailed Service manager with what needed to be done but Service Manager was on vacation. his response “ All the emails that were sent by everyone while manager was on vacation, we deleted all of them.”

Wednesday Phone Call
I recieved a phone call wednesday(1800 number VW dealer) that more parts for warranty had arrived. They asked me when i wanted to book in. I told them my vehicle is there can you please take care of this as i was told all the warranty parts were there prior to the appointment.

I do not think they completed these repairs at all from Wednesday phone call.

I did talk to Phil manager at Chilliwack VW August 6. he told me he was informing Luke to get in contact with me. I will await his call to discuss.

I do not like writing negative reviews but i do feel that communication is lacking in their service department and i am hoping that this can be used for training purposes.

Beware of Dishonest Practices – Fake Inspection and Poor Customer Service

I had one of the worst car-buying experiences at this dealership. They provided what appeared to be a fake inspection report and tried to sell me a car that was not in the condition they advertised. Upon closer inspection by an independent mechanic, I discovered multiple issues that the dealership conveniently “overlooked” or outright lied about.

When I confronted them about these problems, the staff became dismissive, unprofessional, and completely unwilling to make things right. It was clear they were more interested in ripping me off than providing a fair deal.

Their lack of integrity and transparency is shocking. This is not how a reputable business operates. If you value honesty and want peace of mind with your purchase, do not step foot in this place. There are plenty of dealerships out there that actually care about their customers — this isn’t one of them.
Save yourself the stress and look elsewhere. I wish I had.

The service guys have been great. Ashton is fantastic to deal with for scheduling and while I feel that there is a few items not addressed by sales with the purchase of our vehicle everyone has been a pleasure to deal with. Would have 5 stars however unhappy with the tires on our new vehicle (rim damage was repaired and the leak in tire but would prefer a better resolution rather than being told they passed inspection while leaking and still have tire nicks and splits in sides where tires were curbed by previous driver)

Overall a good experience all the way through otherwise

Sales team is very nice and helpful, but sales managers rather max out as much money as possible!  6 months ago, was looking at a car for my daughter.  When I sat down to "Negotiate" the deal, The paperwork reflected a higher prices then advertised!  I called the dealer on that and this response was "what price was promised to you?"   I told him " no price was promised, but at least start at the advertised cost"   He then tells me,  "Car prices Fluctuate every day and that price is no long available!"  (Which is BS.  Then and gave then a reasonable offer on the car. and the manager said it was "Too Low" and refused to even negotiate.  So we walked out.  Two weeks later, we bought a high model same year for that I offered VW.  Now here is the kicker, that same car is still there and they are asking the same price i offered them!

I recently had the pleasure of purchasing a new Volkswagen from Hub City Volkswagen in Prince George, and I couldn't be more satisfied. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and friendly atmosphere. The staff, especially Sunny, the owner, were incredibly helpful and knowledgeable.
Sunny's expertise and dedication to customer satisfaction were truly exceptional. He took the time to understand my specific needs and preferences, and guided me through the entire process with patience and care. His genuine enthusiasm for the brand was infectious, making the experience even more enjoyable.
The entire team at Hub City Volkswagen went above and beyond to ensure my complete satisfaction. Their professionalism, efficiency, and attention to detail were truly impressive. I highly recommend Hub City Volkswagen to anyone in the market for a new or used vehicle.

I drove my 2006 Pontiac Torrent since 2009. I was so nervous to buy a new car with all the pour reviews out there from most brands. I decided to try an Atlas on someone elses suggestion. I also decided to test drive nearly every 3rd row SUV in the city. Atlas surpassed my expectations, love how it drives and I can feel the quality without the silly fluff. What made the experience even better, was Sunny and his team. They let me test drive the car as much as I needed, were thorough in explaining the machine, details on how to drive and the extra bells and whistles. Sunny answered all my annoying questions without judgement and not pushy at all. I drove away from the lot in my new car with confidence that I chose a safe ride for my family, and that I joined a new family with the VW crew. So greatful this was a painless and enjoyable experience, thanks to this dealership! I highly recommend.

Sunny and his team made the process of buying a new car as painless as it can possibly be. He was quick to respond to questions - even during off hours - and was patient when I was waffling on my trim decisions. I appreciated how seamlessly the team worked together even though they're currently working out of a temporary trailer during renovations to the dealership. They made sure that the car was equipped for our colder winters up North and even put the winter tires on prior to pick up. Highly recommend seeing Sunny and his team if you are considering purchasing a new vehicle. Excellent service and prices.

I had an excellent experience purchasing a vehicle from Hub City and would highly recommend them! The team was incredibly patient and never pressured me, even as I took multiple test drives to decide between two vehicles. Their advice, informed by both customer experiences and their own insights, was invaluable.

Now that I’ve had my car for over a month, I’ve reached out to them a few times, and they've consistently provided prompt and helpful responses. This level of service truly sets Hub City apart!

I recently bought a new 2024 Volkswagen Atlas from Hub City Motors, and the experience was fantastic! Sunny was incredibly helpful, throughout the process. The team made everything easy and stress-free. I highly recommend coming to Hubcity VW if you are considering purchasing a new or used VW. Best sales and service team without a doubt!

I recently had the pleasure of working with Michael Pritchard, and I can confidently say that he exceeded all my expectations.

If you’re looking for a someone who genuinely cares about your experience, is transparent and honest, and delivers exceptional service, I wholeheartedly recommend Michael Pritchard. I couldn’t be happier with my new car and the exceptional service I received, thanks Michael and the Volkswagen team!

Always have a good experience with this dealership. Professional and friendly. Bought my ID4 in 2022 from Michael Pritchard who is an excellent salesperson. He took the time to answer all of my questions and kept me updated on the status of my order. I definitely recommend the ID4 and I recommend that you go to Michael to buy it!

I've taken my car to them for years and always had exceptional service. When it was time to trade her in, I had a fantastic experience with Michael who answered my endless questions, and encouraged me to test-drive several models. He also didn't make me feel like a dork for being so emotionally attached to my vehicle, and helped find her a fantastic new home.

I've never felt pressured to buy anything I don't want, or to perform services or maintenance I don't need. I fully trust that my car is in great hands, and that I'll be given the full story.

I almost gave up looking for a new vehicle after several experiences with other dealerships left a sour taste in my mouth but decided to give it one last shot with VW. My partner had just purchased a new vehicle from them and suggested I stop in. I am so happy I did! I was almost skeptical at how relaxed, professional, and honestly enjoyable the experience was from the moment I first walked in to leaving with my dream car.

My sales associate Dale actually LISTENED to what I wanted and what was important to me in a vehicle. Kyle and Dane worked hard and fast to get me the car at the price point I wanted even though I was sure it was impossible. Devaughn took the time to walk me through every square inch of the vehicle and answered all my questions. They also gave me a very fair price for my trade in. I could not be happier.

Buying a new vehicle as a young woman who doesn’t know much about cars is a vulnerable and intimidating experience, and many dealerships are happy to take advantage of that. VW Victoria was a breath of fresh air and truly sets the standard for integrity, professionalism, and quality.

Thank you all for getting me in my dream car. Keep doing what you’re doing.

Bought my first used car here earlier this year. On delivery day, the car had not been detailed, engine bay not cleaned, no new battery installed as promised. Naively I only realized these after I drove it home. Brought up with the salesperson Dale, but was ghosted even after my follow-up. The service department was fine, but I would beware with sales who did not hold their end of the deal, and refused to communicate.

reviews.text:
I cannot express enough gratitude for the exceptional service I received at Comox Valley Volkswagen. The team—Dave, John, and Kathy—went above and beyond to ensure not only my satisfaction but to make me feel valued as a customer for life. Despite my somewhat complex situation, they worked tirelessly to find a solution and get me into a vehicle.

Unfortunately, I am editing my review from 5 stars to a 2. Although the customer service has been excellent, and the vehicle price point was great, my 2024 Tiguan has had nothing but problems and it keeps getting brushed off as hiccups that are covered under warranty. No reimbursement for time out of my days off to come and spend 3 hours in the shop, best they can do is trade my Tiguan for an older one with more KMs. Haven’t even been able to put gas in the car without prying the door open with a key.. still waiting on another service appointment for this issue. There’s been multiple sensor issues, remote start was spotty at best since day 1, cruise control and lane keep being disabled after a software update.. Yes, all covered by warranty, but on my time, feels bad driving this car around not knowing what the next issue will be.

Customer service at the time of purchase is great, but follow up service is terrible. I would never recommend this dealership to anyone. Thank god I no longer have to deal with them.

reviews.text: Sales Consultant Dmytro was both patient and transparent - greatly appreciated! The Sales Manager, Nathan, and Finance Manager Shane were also friendly and efficient. Our whole experience with Okotoks Volkswagen was very positive! Thank you to the team!

DO NOT go to this VW. So, so disappointed. We dropped our 2023 Jetta off November 11th for a free oil change and the check engine light was on. We called on Thursday because we hadn’t heard anything and found out our head gasket needed to be replaced. At not even 30,000 kms!?  After  four days we had to ask them if we were eligible for a loaner. Why wasn’t one offered when they knew they would have it for a major repair? Don’t know. Yes, we could get a rental that had to be VW but we had to drive up to Calgary to get it. (We’re in Claresholm.) Had to wait for approval on the repair as it was under warranty. Got approval and then parts finally arrived but they were working on another head gasket. Two and a half weeks later our car is finally done. Upon arriving I was asked if I had the rental and could I return it to Calgary after we  specifically asked if we could leave the rental at VW Okotoks. I was alone so I told him I had already asked about that and that I wasn’t doing it. Then they try to drop an $380 charge for changing the air and pollen filter they never told us they were changing. I told him that he hadn’t told me about that and I refused to pay for it. They don’t communicate and are dishonest. We spoke to the manager at one point but that made little difference. South Calgary VW is the same manager.
Update: Dec 20 Not even a month after having it back check engine light is back on.

Absolutely horrendous service provided by both the technicians and Joshua Buchanan. After paying almost $3300 in repairs my vehicle was given back to me… only to drive 15 minutes away from the dealership and have my vehicle break down AGAIN. When I received my vehicle back the following service it was completely empty of fuel…The following month and a half my vehicle was in and out of their service department and still the issues were not corrected. When I tried to speak with Joshua their manager about it, my calls were ignored. Finally after threatening to take the issue to the media outlets, I  had my calls returned. Upon speaking with Josh I was told the persistent issues were due to the age of my vehicle and not their incompetence. Save yourself the time and money and take your vehicle somewhere else for service. If you are in the market for a new vehicle…purchase it somewhere else. Absolutely deplorable way of doing business.

My experience at Okotoks Volkswagen was top-notch, and it's largely thanks to the efforts of Alex and Kyle. If you're in the market for a Volkswagen or any other vehicle, I highly recommend visiting this dealership and seeking out their assistance. You won't be disappointed. I'm now a proud owner of a Volkswagen Atlas Cross Sport, and I have Alex and Kyle to thank for making it happen!

I was super interested in a vehicle. Came in filled out some paper work but they wouldn’t budge on price. I walked away and they dropped the vehicle by $1500. Had they made it worth while I would have went through with the purchase.
On the flip side they were very kind and zero issues getting my deposit back!

reviews.text:
I want to thank the salesman Conner who provided me with great customer service. He answered all my messages and calls, as needed in a good timely manner.

I am truly disappointed with my purchase of the 2024 VW Taos. There are features that don’t work as they should, including my apple car play which I have included photos. When the vehicle was brought into the service department it was stated that it’s just an update that needs to be made…  it’s a brand new vehicle and it interesting that those updates wouldn’t have been done a couple days prior to me driving off the lot. There is no reason on why my screen should be going completely black or glitching. I was told to just shut the vehicle off and on to reset it. Any vehicle owner of a brand new one should not have to shut it on/off for things to work properly. It’s BRAND new, wasn’t even owned for a couple days before issues happened.

I also am still unable to use my keyless entry for unlocking the doors, and there is a continuous rattling in the front end.

Again, I am truly disappointed with this vehicle and would never recommend anyone to purchase it.
Shiny spacious new showroom. Must have drunk four big cappuccino from the Nespresso machine while I waited. I was given a super deal on engine and carpet shampoo.

Just got my used vehicle from them and they were super accommodating. I'm a pretty demanding customer when it comes to vehicle purchasing as I don't trust car dealers easily, but they worked with me on everything I asked for from the sales guy, to the finance man straight up to the manager. Trust me, I probably annoyed the crap out of all of them. They all took my calls when I had questions or concerns, ( went out of their way) and got me what I wanted.  And now I'm loving my new SUV. Great vehicle! Great customer service! Kudos to my team. -Aiden, Justin & Casey! They've earned my loyalty for sure! I'll be back again.

Absolutely amazing buying experience with Straightline VW! Came here after a terrible experience in Calgary with another brand dealer. Had the pleasure of meeting Conner Roe my salesperson. From the moment I sat down at his desk he was attentive, honest, and seemed like he genuinely wanted to earn my business. Part way through our initial conversation Casey Reeder the sales manager came over and introduced himself which was a nice touch, and took the information about my trade.
Went for a test drive with Conner, and before we got in the car he highlighted every intricate detail of the car in a super simple and professional manner. He truly knows what’s important. That continued when we got in the car.
After the test drive, Casey had a trade number for me which was exactly where I wanted it to be which again highlights their honesty. Conner and I discussed some options, total price and I was sold.
Then I got to sit with Justin Smith in finance who immediately came across as a genuine human. In the end I settled on some warranty and protection I’d normally get after market outside of a dealer because their prices were fair, competitive, and they just made me feel valued from the second I walked in. Driving for 30 years and having purchased 7 brand new vehicles this was truly the most comfortable buying experience I’ve had, across all levels of the dealership. Forgot, Grant the GM also popped over to say hi at one point, which again super nice touch.
You will not go wrong heading into Straightline VW. Ask for Conner, you’ll be happy you did! Exactly what a car buying experience should be!

Had a wonderful experience from salesman all the way up to the top management!! Very friendly, not pushy. Felt like I was the one in charge the entire time. Cannot say enough about these people. Thanks guys 😁

The rear camera had a crack in protective casing that I have not identified before buying the car and after first car wash fogged up and when I asked the dealership to review this, I was asked to pay $300 for service inspection during which I was told "your camera is foggy and will require replacement", for another $2000. While I negotiated the price down to just over $1000, another mechanic used a hair dryer to defog it for me for free. I would have expected the premium VW mechanics to at least try for the $300 I paid.

Additionally, when I was buying the car, one of the key fobs was missing the physical key, and I was assured by the salesperson that this would be addressed. Nearly one year later, this is still not addressed, and I have been bounced around between sales and service and now lost to the system.

I hope new cars fare better here.

For me, she put my address incorrectly, and the response to me was disapproval for lease, and financing with a co-signer, and 8% interest rate instead of 5%. They advertised on their website that they have an option to sell  their car with 0% interest, but when I asked about it, they ignored that offer.

Overall, I would like to give 0 star out of 5 to this dealership.

If you are concerned about your convenience, and like to sleep well and without headache, NEVER go to this center.

reviews.text:
I recently took my car to Owasco Volkswagen, hoping for a straightforward warranty repair and alignment. Unfortunately, my experience left a lot to be desired. I originally brought the car in to have the water pump and thermostat replaced under warranty, but they decided not to do the work, claiming “nothing was wrong.” While the tire alignment I requested was completed without issue, I was shocked to find that 20 kilometers had been added to my car’s odometer between drop-off and pick-up. I can’t imagine why a tire alignment would require this kind of distance, making it seem like someone took my car out for a joyride. And when I go to check my dash cam footage, the whole SD card got completely wiped so I no longer have an important video that needed to be reported since the technician wiped the SD card and now all of the footage is gone, so it makes you think who was in my car and what were they doing with my car.

To make matters worse, the “complimentary car wash” was poorly done. My car was still dirty in the front and back, and to top it off, their supposed “touchless” wash left a noticeable scratch on the roof of my car. Overall, this experience has left me deeply disappointed and questioning the professionalism and care at Owasco Volkswagen.

Had a wonderful recall experience with Owasco Whitby, Jey the rep provided an accurate timeline for the service, without additional sales pressure to take on additional work. I say this because I did have a couple other things which needed completed however, my schedule had changed for the day. Standard car wash at the end was fantastic though a bit of the rims could have used some minor attention.

I had an awesome experience buying my new car. Steve Kisil made the whole process super smooth and easy. I think I got a great deal on my trade-in too! I had a tiny after sales customer service issue to sort out, and Steve handled it like a pro. It’s great to know that the customer service team is on top of things! 😊. I highly recommend Peterborough Volkswagen.
It’s worth the drive to Peterborough 😉.

I just want to start off by thanking the parts and service team at Peterborough VW. Every time I’ve brought my golf in for service they’ve been helpful and understanding. As a university student they’ve been understanding of potential costs and provided me with options when creating quotes. They were extremely helpful when my fuel pump died and they took the diagnostic cost out of my bill because the issue was previously missed.

As for the parts team, they ordered me a new seat latch within 24 hours after a Toronto dealership couldn’t be bothered to order one and told me it was out of stock. I would honestly consider driving back to Peterborough VW from Toronto to have my car serviced here again or to purchase another VW.

Also, Volksfest in the Kawarthas was pretty fun

I recently purchased the 2024 Atlas with the help of Steve at Peterborough Volkswagen. He made the process easy and low stress - while not packing on typical salesman pressure. I was able to get into my new car by the end of the week! Highly recommend working with Steve.

I had a problem at another dealership when purchasing my vehicle 8 months ago and they did NOTHING to help me. So I came to Peterborough VW and had a great experience. Steve was awesome and not in it to just make a sale. He genuinely cared about my situation and helped me find a car that worked for our family needs. Thanks Steve!

I haven’t purchased a vehicle yet, but I want to give a shoutout to Steve for his excellent customer service.

First, I received a callback so quickly right before closing time. I was initially anxious since I know nothing about cars, but Steve explained everything clearly, giving me the clarity and I needed to move forward in my research.

queried_address: New Sudbury Volkswagen Ltd. 1593 Lasalle Blvd Sudbury ON P3A1Z8 Canada
actual_address: 1593 Lasalle Blvd, Greater Sudbury, ON P3A 1Z8, Canada

reviews.text: I had a bad phone call once with someone in service but that was quite some time ago. My recent experience has been 5 stars. Travis at the service desk has gone above and beyond being helpful and friendly. There is no VW dealership in my home town and must travel 2 hours to get here but they make it worth all the travel.

I had a fantastic experience at this dealership! The sales team was helpful and knowledgeable, the service department took great care of my car, and management ensured everything went smoothly. Highly recommend them for anyone looking for excellent customer service!

Recently had a great experience at new Sudbury VW. Everything from beginning to end was easy, quick and pressure free. Jamie our sales associate is fantastic, she is very knowledgeable about her product and very friendly/ easy to talk too. We told her what we were looking for and she showed us all the options that fit our needs. I look forward to dealing with New Sudbury VW in the future weather it be with the service team or the purchase of my next Vehicle!

Would give negative starts but it won’t let me. They called me saying all my parts arrived I booked my appointment at 8:15 in the morning as I live 3 hours away and I’d be able to go home earlier they brought my car in at 1pm and only changed a rear sway bar. They did not change any other part that was supposed to be and they are not replacing parts that are clearly broken. Worst place ever worst service ever they do not know how to run a dealership worth making an extra hour drive for good mechanics and good service

We just bought a new VW Tiguan 2024 from Jamie Vannorman! She is an excellent  salesperson and  we were very pleased on how we were treated and also what we received for our trade-in. She was a pleasure to deal with and we highly recommend her and Vw Sudbury!!

queried_address: Brantford Volkswagen 131 Lynden Rd Brantford ON N3R8A7 Canada
actual_address: 10 Easton Rd, Brantford, ON N3P 1J5, Canada

reviews.text:
I had a very relaxed good experience with my used car purchase there.
Salesperson JB and administrative person Melissa were very pleasant to work with.
Quite the refreshing change from the usual odious bartering transaction you typically get when buying a car.
Definitely recommending to my friends and family.

Awesome experience here. I had researched dealers in the area on Google before selecting Brantford, and the public was not wrong. Dave and Mel were terrific, easy going and very helpful. I had a couple of requests when purchasing a new vehicle and they were accommodating the whole way. Would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone in the market for a new vehicle. Worth the drive even from the GTA!

I just purchased a used Jetta from Brantford VW.  It was an incredible experience.  JB and Angela went the extra mile and then some to make sure everything went smoothly.  I highly recommend this dealership.

Will start off by saying we have always experienced good, but slow service at the Brantford VW location. Booked an appt 1.5 wks ago for a new hitch. When the appt was made it was expressed then that we would drop and wait, We didn't have a have a full day to wait. Car was dropped off Sunday night for a 9am Monday appt. We called st 9 to remind them that we had a 12:30 deadline…. The wheels fell off right then. She advised she “would do her best”

Arrived at the dealer shop at 1045 and car was sitting in the parking lot. We were happy that the job was completed!
Went into see a service adviser and they let us know that the car hadn’t been in yet….!?
The adviser was then very dismissive when we shared our time concern and said “ what would You like me to do?” I said then would You have a loaner car? “His response “well no”

Service manager comes out and states “Your 9am is for the service adviser not for the shop and You need to communicate better with Us your time constraints”

…Umm Sir, we were very specific of our “time constraints” when We booked and were told it was “just a two hour job and would be done in plenty of time”. Service Manager was “shocked” by this statement! There was a 3.5 hrs allotted for a 2 hr job. But of course they over book.

Then to make matters worse when the car did finally go in after 11am the service technician had Our car door open and was smoking at the car. Service Manager was a little surprised when I took issue with this!
Then a woman pulled up to the  with a Jetta (no appt) and our technician began to help Her…?!! And brought out a computer to clear codes etc…
Seems like we will be making a drive elsewhere for future service and maintenance needs.

**update. The service manager did come back out to Us at 1215 and offer a loaner car as we needed to get my F.I.L. To an important medical appt at a Toronto hospital. (Thus our time constraint). That was very appreciated!  He did also give Us two coupons for a detailing. Thank You for hearing Our concerns, and speaking with Your team about importance of communicating customers needs within the team.

My wife and I went to Volkswagen to purchase our first car together and we definitely made the right choice. JB and Mel made the process super easy and helped us pick out a vehicle we quickly fell in love with. I highly recommend Brantford Volkswagen!

reviews.text: We recently purchased our new VW Taos from Belleville Volkswagen and were very impressed at the service we received from Tyson and Trudy. Every part of dealing with them was a pleasure. They are professional and informed. This dealership knows how to treat their customers unlike many that are not upfront and only after every extra dollar from your pocket to close the deal. If you are looking for a hassle free vehicle purchase then visit this dealership.

I was in the market for a new car and unfortunately visited another dealership first. It was a terrible experience and I began looking at other brands. In the end I really wanted the Golf R so I reached out to Belleville Volkswagen and Elizabeth looked after everything for me. The process was extremely easy, no surprise fees, no misleading tactics, etc.

I recently bought a new Jetta at Belleville Volkswagen, and I have only great things to say about this team! From helping to navigate delays (not the fault of the dealer) to responding to concerns, the team communicates well and responds quickly. Notably, Greg and Michelle in service are outstanding, as is Elizabeth in sales.

Recently I observed that their single-stall washrooms were labeled with gender markers. I made a suggestion that re-labeling them without genders would meet the needs of customers regardless of their gender expression and they actually made the change! Well done, Belleville Volkswagen!!

My family have been VW people since the early 80s. Starting with my parents, then me,  and now my daughter also. Belleville VW is by far the best dealer we've dealt with over the years. They are always so friendly. Recently, back in December, my daughter had a coolant issue with her Taos. Parts were back ordered, but they were willing to give her a loaner until her car could be fixed. The issue wasn't that bad, so she kept driving it and kept an eye on it. Fast forward to February, service called her and made an appointment to get her car fixed. The job was gonna take quite a few hours, so they gave her a loaner and got to work. A day and a half later, her car was ready. They also changed her rear brakes, which were all under warranty.  The staff are always friendly and know their VWs. Thank you for treating us with such care. 5 stars all day long.

Best garage and dealership I’ve ever dealt with.  My new car has a couple issues and they dealt with the issues in a respectful friendly manner even covering and fixing issues that occurred before the warranty was up after the 80,000 kms.
The service department staff are so friendly and explain issues in great detail to help you understand.  I would recommend Belleville VW any day!

reviews.text: I recently visited this dealership and worked with Brent, the sales manager. I was really impressed with Brent’s professionalism and knowledge. He took the time to answer all my questions, provided valuable insights about different vehicles, and never made me feel pressured. Brent was patient and thorough, which made the whole experience enjoyable. I would definitely recommend speaking with him if you’re considering buying a car. He genuinely wants to help customers find the right vehicle for them.

I had a fantastic experience purchasing my Atlas from Brent at Orillia Volkswagen. He was knowledgeable, friendly, and made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. Brent took the time to answer all my questions and ensured I felt confident in my choice. I highly recommend him and the dealership for anyone looking to buy a vehicle!

Bought a VW Atlas from here a couple of months ago. Brent was the best salesman I’ve ever dealt with! Made the transition super easy and he definitely knew his stuff. Will 100% buy my next car from him. Very enjoyable experience!

Make sure you look over the car, the salesman won’t tell you what’s wrong with it. And make sure you look over the carfax, they’ll tell you it’s clean when it’s not. When these issues were pointed out there was absolutely nothing done to even try and fix it. Then my texts eventually got ignored. I will be buying cars privately from now on. Would have been better off that way.

The VW salespeople were very attentive and quick to answer all my questions. Not pushy salespeople like some other dealerships I visited, and Brent, the main person I interacted with was very nice. I feel like he cared about my needs and I'm happy with my car. Highly recommend!

reviews.text:
I recently purchased an VW ID.4 from Oakville Volkswagen, and overall, I had a very positive experience. There was an issue with a recall that initially caused some concern, but Arnold and Andrew were incredibly responsive and kept me informed throughout the entire process. Their consistent communication gave me peace of mind, and they made sure to resolve everything efficiently.

The car pickup was smooth and hassle-free. Everything was prepared and ready when I arrived, which made the process a lot easier than I expected. Despite the initial setback with the recall, the professionalism and care shown by Arnold and Andrew truly made the experience enjoyable. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a hassle-free car buying experience!

I recently purchased a new car from Oakville Volkswagen, and I couldn't be happier with the experience.
Jerry Yang, the salesperson who assisted me, was outstanding. He was incredibly knowledgeable about the various models and took the time to understand my needs and preferences. Jerry's friendly demeanor and patience made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. He answered all my questions thoroughly and provided valuable insights that helped me make an informed decision.

I highly recommend Oakville Volkswagen and especially Jerry Yang for anyone looking to purchase a new car. Their commitment to customer satisfaction is truly commendable. Thank you, Jerry, for making my car-buying experience so positive!

Great experience led by super professional sales rep, Brittany. From trade-in value to additional value had services included in the deal, this purchase was a no-brainer especially when you consider the vehicle was ready in days, NOT WEEKS, OR YEARS. Truly, a first class buying experience.

Just purchased a car from Oakville Volkswagen and want to express my sincere gratitude to Jerry Yang for providing excellent service throughout the process, from the test drive to explaining the features and beyond. This is the first car we’ve purchased locally, and we feel very fortunate to have encountered such a professional and enthusiastic staff member like Jerry. Dalmar Motors Ltd

We both purchased new Jettas from Dalmar Motors Ltd.
My daughter is  really enjoying her Comfort Line Jetta. Encouraging me to shop at Dalmar Motors Ltd.
I love my new 2025 Volkswagen Jetta GLI !   A huge Thank You to Tom, Willy, Rob and The Dalmar Team for bringing our dream cars to our garages !

Bought my atlas in there for coolant leak checkup after leaving dealership check engine light came on and when I mentioned them they did not want to admit that their machanic did something and they want to charge me again for inspection for $149.
After leaving them I went to my mechanic and he found unplugged sensor cable and putting that back check engine light went off and car running normal.
Thing which upset me is service manager said come tomorrow we will refund check fee of $74 and don’t come back again
We bought over $50000 atlas and Jetta from this dealer and their customer service not good at all.

I recently purchased a car from Dalmar, and Tom was fantastic and was able to guide me through and answer any questions I had. Highly recommend anyone looking for a car to deal with him. Rob was also a great help to ensure the transaction went through properly.

Took our 2021 Tiguan that we bought there in a year ago for a check engine light. Took them about 3 visits to figure out what was wrong, an emissions sensor. Light was off for about 8 months then turned on again so we took it back in to see what was wrong. Kept the car for 6 days. Ended up not figuring what was wrong, charged $500 for what amounted to an oil change and didn’t even do any of the work we asked them to do. We asked them to change the breaks while the car was apart for 6 days, nope must’ve been too much to ask for… Customer service is atrocious. Fully admit to getting angry with them but this was after we were told that “the car has 90k km you should expect this” and also told “because the car has less than 100k km, we can’t give you the loaner that your extended warranty covers because your still in the original power train warranty”. For the record the engine light issue has been going on since the car had 50 or 60k km. Car costed about 56k after taxes so I suppose when you shop here you pay about $1000 per km without repair, which they obviously think is fair because we should’ve “expected this”

actual_address: 2360 Auto Mall Ave, London, ON N5V 0B4, Canada

reviews.text: Just did my service right here for my Golf R. The service advisor Tanner is really nice and helps me with all my questions. The technician Tom sent me a video about what he did for my car and checked the brakes and tires level as well. Fantastic experience and professional team here with the dealership. Definitely worth a 5 out of 5 for everything.

Their cars are electrical piles of crap. Do yourself a favor and never shop here or any VW.
If you enjoy your brand new car dying repeatedly while driving full speed on the 401, then by all means, shop VW.
Brand new car has been to your facility for electrical issues 4 times, and now it's outright dead in Ottawa. Now, I'm stranded in Ottawa, no vehicle, no way of getting home to work Friday. If I wanted to deal with non stop issues, I'd have bought a used vehicle. What did I get? A brand new vehicle that's been in the shop for issues more times than in 20 years of owning Honda cars combined.
Buyer beware!!!

These people are very (fake) nice, until you sign papers and they have your money. After that, everything changes. The car had more damages than was shared before I had a look at it (and they had me sign). I was fine with the damage that was communicated upfront. However, once inspected, there were more issues than what was previously shared. They promised to repair at least some of the more minor damages since none of it was shared with me.  However, every attempt to contact them to book an appointment has failed. They will not accept your calls, neither respond to your emails, which is a complete turnaround from the constant (almost instantaneous) communication that occurred before the purchase. I received a quote of $4500 at a repair shop to fix at least part of the damages out of pocket. The true cost would be closer to $7000-$8000 to fix everything. Ironically, I paid this amount extra at this dealership to purchase the vehicle because it looked in almost perfect condition compared to other ones I saw elsewhere. This turned out to not be the case but I'm still out the extra amount I paid, I'm still stuck with the damages and still zero communication. If you expect honesty and kept promises, I suggest you go somewhere else.

I purchased a vehicle about a month and a half ago from this dealership and the service I received from Jake Harbarenko and Abby O'Neill-Reddin was excellent. The day of buying the vehicle, they both stayed late with me at the dealership to address any questions I had and make sure I understood everything there was to know about the vehicle trade-in process. Jake was one of the most friendly sales representatives I've ever interacted with and really made me feel at home in the dealership. After almost 2 months, the vehicle I purchased hasn't had any surprises and I am still very happy with my purchase and service I received from them. Thanks again team!

*IMPORTANT UPDATE*

The team at Leavens really stepped up to resolve things. They apologized for the condition of the vehicle on delivery and placed a credit on our account for a replacement air filter and installation which was appreciated. Furthermore—the dealership agreed to cover the full replacement cost of the damaged tire and got the replacement done quickly. I am appreciative and will definitely be keeping my business with them.

—

Awful experience with both sales and service at this dealership — with no effort to resolve their issues. If you value your time and quality customer service do not do business with this dealership.

Regarding the vehicle sale: the salesperson disclosed that the vehicle had been smoked in but promised it would be cleaned up and deodorized. Received vehicle on delivery day to discover that none of the air filters had been replaced and the upholstery had visible markings (it had not been detailed). Promise broken. Again, no remedy.

Regarding service: beware that their vehicles are sold with a tire insurance package that limits your services to their dealership only. The service shop won’t take appointments and forced me (and two kids under two years old) to arrive and then drive away with a slow flat tire because they were too busy. My wife went back with the vehicle again on a slower day and they left her waiting two hours. It’s brazen disrespect for people’s time and zero care or consideration for families.

The service was great. My question is this: if the FOB battery gets drained because the car was being serviced for two days because of a recall, then should I be made to pay for it? I know it is just a battery, but someone could have called me and asked me if I had a battery. I can buy four of them on amazon for the price I got charged. It is little details like this that make truly exceptional service. Mr. Levine made it right as the car would not start. I appreciate it very much. The reason I did not address it when it happened was I was extremely tired, and did not wish to become angry over a battery. I also was a bit shocked as my wheel covers were replaced no questions asked. But,I have put a battery in my wallet in case it fails in a similar fashion. I have been going to this dealership for more than 10 years. So, I must like the service.

The first time I came here was because the check engine light came on the day I was supposed to drive across Ontario to put my dog down. Thank you, Pickering Volkswagen, for going above and beyond!

Update:
They reached out to me and apologized, also acknowledging where they fell short in this sale and certification process. Then they asked me to remove my review while they look into what they can do to make the wrongs right. Out of good faith I did. This was Oct 2nd, since then I have been trying to get an update from them and nada. Its Dec Now!!!!
First time around the sales guy ghosts me and now the manager. I have been having to deal with this since purchasing it in August. At this point I'm taking this very personal, it's no longer just a business transaction that can be resolved with a goodwill gesture from them. I will be moving my complaint and all the correspondence I had with these people to OMVIC and VW Canada.

Original Review:
This is not a VW dealer, this is more of a small no name dealer who your parents always tell you to stay away from. Get everything in writing, they verbally promise the world.
Once you pay they will never address any of your issues or call you back or even reply to your email to say hey sorry but we can't do anything.
Bought a used vw from them, I'm pretty sure not much was done to check this car. Even the items they told me they did I don't believe anymore. Had to take it to the mechanic after only 500km of driving it. The mechanic confirmed the chips on the glass should have not passed safely. The one in front of the driver that was fixed has a thin crack line all the way to the top, the haldex fluid they said they did was not done. The dsg fluid they said they did can't be checked unless I pay for a change, but doesn't look like it was done either.
Car was misaligned and one of the tires is fully warm out on the inside. But the dealer apparently aligned the car with the bad tire so now the wheel is always slightly to the left. To top it all off the battery has already failed. The Blower motor had issues, one of the cylinders is giving oil around the spark plug. Who knows how many more things will go wrong.
Plus they didn't even do simple basic stuff like cabin filter and engine filter.
Bought brand new rims from them for the winter tires. Found out one rim is damaged.
I try to reach out to them multiple times, but I can't even talk to the person to tell me if this is something they can address or not.
If they are to sell a used car like this, at least sell it as-is so people can price thousands on top for fixing it, or they can just get a better car for the money that they needed to put into this one.

Sherman was fantastic to work with. He is professional, responsive and did his best to make this process as smooth as possible. He went above and beyond in so many ways including detailing my new (to me) car himself. Absolutely recommend him, and Pickering VW.

My wife and recently purchased a VW vehicle and were thrilled with the high level of service.  Sherman Delgato provided an excellent package of insights to make the buying process an enjoyable one for a heath care worker who needed something new.

actual_address: 5500 Dixie Rd Unit G, Mississauga, ON L4W 4N3, Canada

reviews.text:
BUYER BEWARE. I had came into Volkswagen Dixie after checking out many used cars within the Scarborough and surrounding areas. I found this "Certified Pre-owned" VW Jetta 2019 to be very promising, it drove well, it had the specs I was looking for, however, the front bumper was badly beaten up by stone chips. I looked past that and went ahead with the sale on the condition that they repaint the entire bumper for me, the sales man agreed and I went home happy.

So here's the first red flag: I called back to get a status update on the painting of my bumper and asked to speak to the first sales agent who attended me, he had quit. So, I was assigned another sales agent, ok, no problem.

Second red flag: I get the call that the car is ready to be picked up, so I pay for an uber to take me to the dealership just to find that only the lip of the bumper was repainted and that there was a rust spot developing under a section of the quarter panel (refer to pictures). As I mentioned it to the sales agent he seemed apprehensive and just kept repeating that his manager wouldnt do anything about it and that they cant do anything about it. On top of it all, the front lip they did end up repainting was a colour mismatch!

Third red flag: my newly assigned sales agent offered me a loaner but to take my car home anyways and he would let me know when the loaner was available. The offer was that I can leave my car at the dealership and have the bumper finished, and have the loaner in the meantime, but I agreed to no avail because I never got the loaner ever.

Fourth red flag: on my way home from Mississauga to Scarborough, the rearview mirror falls right off the windshield, just my luck as I had waited a long time for the car to have the bumper repainted. Now, I call the sales agent to tell him about the issue and "they couldnt do anything about it, as it was not under warranty." At this point I'm dealing with all of these issues and I haven't even made my first payment on the car. So, I go to another mechanic to fork up another $700 to get the housing and brackets of the rearview mirror and all its parts reinstalled as the windshield it was on when I bought the VW had been replaced.

I would have thought as one of the safety protocols this dealership adheres by they would have fixed my rearview mirror as it is one of the most integral parts of commuting. But it never happened.

As anyone would be, I was frustrated with their lack of transparency and customer service, had I have known that I was going to run into all this trouble, I would have definitely never bought this car and looked elsewhere. The reason why I chose a VE dealership is because I imagined since its coming off a VW lot it would have been taken care of with quality service, but that wasnt the case.

Going back and fourth in ubers (3 trips), and the cost of my now new windshield with the installation of the rearview mirror had cost me alot more than I bargained for, for a car coming out of a dealership, great job guys!

I did end up getting my car back after I left it to get the painting job finished to which they actually did a good job, but overall, this second experience of buying a VW from this dealership has been one of the most excruciatingly stressful and horrible experiences I ever had.

My advice, check everysingle detail of the car you wish to buy from this dealership and do not put a deposit on it unless you have it writing that you get what you will get the work that needs to be done on it fully done, not partially done. I made that mistake and it has cost me alot more than what I was expecting to pay on the car. Shame that I had to deal with all these issues within the first few weeks of buying this car not having made a single payment yet.

Hopefully they can improve their customer service.

Bought my first brand new vehicle here - I’ve always only ever had pre-owned vehicles. My fiancé and I originally went to Kia to see their cars but got rejected because we didn’t have a trade in. Thankfully at Volkswagen, they were selling without trade ins. My sales representative was Jean-Francois Racine and he is fabulous! He explained what vehicles they had available and what our options were. He was not pushy in anyway and the transaction was smooth. I had to wait 2 months for my car but that’s just the world we are currently living in. Jean-Francois followed up with me the day before and after I picked up my car, even though he was on holiday. He even answered my frantic text on the weekend when I thought I found scratches on my new car (it was just dried soap woops). He was quick to answer my text and book me a service appointment the next day when I got a nail in the tire. Thank you Jean-Francois!

DO NOT BUY YOUR CAR IN THIS DEALERSHIP!
This must have been the worst experience buying a car thus far. The second you buy the car, you are rest assured to be kicked to the curve. The first week from buying my 2024 Volkswagen Atlas Execline, it has had multiple problems, from window regulators not working properly, to a whole radio system that was glitching in the screen and had to be replaced (making me wait for 2 months), a wiggly and lose driver seat, a GPS that doesn't work, and the emergency phone call did not work.

I understand car problems happen, but its their lack of care when servicing the car and poor customer service that its my issue. I had to bring the car back 4 times during 2 weeks because they couldn't take the proper time to check the entire car (as I requested) before giving it back (something that should have been done before selling me the new car). Additionally, they couldn't get me the license plate, and gave up after noticing that the SAAQ sent it to the old address of my business. They never called or told me anything for the 2 months. I called 5 times asking for an update, and they would say they'd call back, but nothing. Not a single call. Today I get a call from Danielle, from the service department, requesting I return the loaner today because the radio is fixed. I told him I'm out of town, and he kept arguing back he needs the car today for another client, to the point that it got disrespectful when i told him I needed my license plate for my car. His answer? "It's not my problem, that's from the sales department, I want my car back today". It goes to show the lack of care for customers, since he wouldn't even transfer me to the sales department. 5 times I called them, and never got a call back, to now be given back my car after 2 months and multiple problems later, and now without a license plate.

Once you pay, you're not their problem anymore. I should've read the reviews sooner, as there has been many similar problems regarding their service quality and poor customer service.

NEXT TIME, BUY FROM BYTEK VW OTTAWA. They have a proper trackrecord with quality service, and they always take care of their customers without making them feel like they've been stranded.

reviews.text:
I have been dealing with Volkswagen Spinelli for nearly two years regarding a rust warranty claim on my Tiguan. Initially, my experience was positive with the previous after-sales manager, who handled the repair of my roof and quarter panels efficiently. However, the remaining repairs to my two doors were delayed as the parts had not yet arrived. When the parts did come in, I spent an additional 4-5 months following up with the new after-sales manager before finally getting an appointment. Unfortunately, the quality of the work I received was nothing short of unacceptable.

The doors were painted in a completely different color from the rest of my vehicle and were installed unevenly. After consulting with multiple other mechanics and dealerships, it was unanimously agreed that this was a substandard job. When I approached Spinelli to correct their work, they refused, stating that they were not responsible for paint blending and advised me to contact Volkswagen Canada. This, however, was not an issue of blending—the doors were clearly painted the wrong color.

I then escalated the issue to Volkswagen Canada, only to be met with further frustration. After a month of back-and-forth, they simply referred the case back to the dealership, offering no resolution. This circular process between the dealership and Volkswagen Canada has been an utter waste of time and demonstrates a complete lack of accountability.

Given the poor service, lack of responsibility, and inadequate communication from both Volkswagen Spinelli and Volkswagen Canada, I will not be purchasing another Volkswagen vehicle in the future. I expect far better from a brand of this stature, and this experience has been deeply disappointing.

It's really an amazing experince to join volkswagen family. This was the best service we have ever experienced and the whole team was so friendly and energetic. Many thanks to Geethan for helping us get this great car withen 3 weeks.

I had an exceptional experience buying a new Tiguan from VW Spinelli.

I was met by Edith on first day. She took the time and the effort to show me all of the possibilities and options during a whole afternoon. Her kindness and enthusiasm was a blessing. Anthony also helped during this easy and friendly process. The entire process was seamless, thanks to this incredible duo. They were knowledgeable, professional, and made me feel comfortable throughout the buying process.

Anabel and Saj in finance was also fantastic, ensuring everything was clear, straightforward and with ease to understand. I couldn’t be happier with my new vehicle and the amazing/outstanding service I received.
The four of you made this possible with no headaches and I am forever grateful for this.

Id like to start by addressing the staff, they are attentive and super friendly however there is a huge lack of communication between one another.
My journey with VW started in July of this year and i can honestly say i have yet to be pleased with any service i have received.

We traded in our lease from Hyundai, we were told one price for the vehicle and when Hyundai received the check there was a payment missing  after months of back and fourth between both dealerships ( VW & hyundai) and the issue not being resolved my husband’s name was sent to collections!

Shortly after I started having technical problems with my screen and back up, camera contacted the dealership they had me bring my vehicle in. They changed my radio two days later I was still having the same issues reached out to the dealership multiple times over a course of weeks never received a call back until I finally filed a complaint in which they ended up contacting me telling me they didn’t see anything on file took in everything that needed to be done on the vehicle provided me an appointment for December 4 told me that it would be four hours.
My appointment was for 8 AM. My husband had an appointment for 3:30 PM when I contacted the dealership to see where they were in servicing my vehicle they advised me that it was still being worked on however, I received notifications via my app that they only access to my vehicle at 2 PM. I had to leave work an hour and a half early to assist my husband to his appointment since he had no way there. Upon receiving my vehicle i was not able to connect to apple car play finally was able to connect via bluetooth. Today dec 6th i get in my vehicle and my screen is completely BLACK. Wont turn on , mind you the acreen controls everything so now i cant turn off / lower my heat, i cant turn my heated seat on , i cant access my back up camera. I am so fed up with this vehicle IF YOUR LOOKING TO LEASE / PURCHASE THE ATLAS CROSS SPORT I WOULD INVESTIGATE BEFORE HAND!!!!!

On top of all of this i forgot to mention that we had a huge scrape / missing paint on the roof of our vehicle that we realized a few days after delivery and the dealership tried blaming us for this issue.

Countless phone calls / appointments, constant disappointment, nothing to make up for these errors / inconveniences.
I will from now on have my vehicle serviced at another VW location as i can no longer trust in their service.

I just picked up a 2024 VW Tiguan. Excellent service all around from being welcomed at the reception desk to the sales and delivery team that treat their clients like guests! To the service dept A1 on the detailing! I’ve never seen a car shine like that!! I highly recommend VW Spinelli!  A trust worthy team, fair prices, great communication and they over deliver on their customer service! Not to mention a beautiful new dealership in Lachine!

reviews.text: Great service staff, friendly, helpful, can’t be more happy at this dealership. I have dealt with Derek who used to be in service and who is now in sales and this gentleman will go above and beyond for you! He is the 💎 of this dealership!

I am very happy with the way the purchase went. The car dealer (Cedric) was very nice and helpful. Had the chance to take the car for a spin before purchasing it and very happy with the outcome. Thank you to all the team at Volkswagen St-Hyacinthe.

Fantastic service and purchase experience dealing with Sacha Morin and the team at St-Hyacinthe VW. Very professional and responsive with all my questions as I was purchasing from out of town. Our CPO VW was exactly as described on the day of pickup and exceeded my expectations. Very competitive pricing with no games. I would highly recommend St-Hyacinthe VW and will be buying my next VW here.

I went to the used dealership to go look at a specific car I wanted. As I walked in, I did not feel welcomed. I had to go see someone siting at his desk, looking at his phone. He then said someone else would take care of me.

Lou, came to see me and he was alright. I have nothing bad to say about him. Very helpful, and came with me on a ride in the car ad my vehicle was being evaluated as an exchange

When we came back to the dealership, I met with the director that evaluated my car. He first asked me if I had ever had a certain maintenance done to my car, head gasket if I recall correctly, and continued saying that this was a usual problem on that particular model and that was why he was giving a lower price on my car. I then said that I could also ask a reduction on the car I was there for as I also could speculate problems on that particular model. I get it, it’s the business. But the way he was belittling me when he was explaining he had no margin was unfortunate.

When we looked at the numbers, he then said there was an additional 500$ fee he needed to add, as this was added to all the cars in all dealers to guarantee the rate.  That 500$ fee was never mentioned on the brochure (website) nor did I see little writing mentioning that fee. When I mentioned that this practice was illegal, he then said he would not charge that fee just to show me his good intentions.  At that point I knew I would never buy a car from that dealership and left a few minutes later.

I went to 4 other dealership St Bruno, Drummondville, Granby and Brossard and none of then where asking for a 500$ fee to guarantee the rate. They never even heard of that kind of fee and confirmed that it was illegal to do so.

Hopefully they understand that a client that comes in and leave with a bad experience is more likely to talk about it to friends, family and others. We all need cars, but dealerships need customers.

They were great! Had car troubles on my way through Montreal, so I stopped in. They took great care of me! Rushed the work since they knew I was heading to the Maritimes that day. I'd definitely do business with them again!

Went to Valleyfield and received the same disgusting service. Never again will I buy Volkswagen...it 's too bad because I really love my car. I strongly discourage anyone from buying from them...they don't deserve your money.

Excellent service and parts, I never had a complaints or problems, and when I ask if I could try out one of their new mk8 golf r, they pretty much yes and now I want an golf r. Nice worker and people, can't complaint.

BEWARE ONLINE ADS
CHECK THE CARFAX THOROUGHLY
Wasted my time with a vehicle in their used inventory, only to find out it had been marked as SALVAGED in Ontario (no disclosure in their ad or after contacting them) then transferred to Quebec, where they had the title changed

Amazing experience! I am so thankful with this dealership! Julie and all the staff treated us so kindly and they were so attentive! We were on a roadtrip our car broke down and the closest place was this one, they were so happy to have us and fixed our problems right away! They got us coffee and water and where checking on us often so we knew we were taken care of. I’m so happy we bought our car in VW and even thought we live in toronto I would definitely come back to this dealership in the future because this has been the best customer service we have received!

reviews.text:
Pretty good service, specially Sales Charles, he did perfect job, I love.
Very recommendation place, all vehicles good condition.
A very smooth transaction. Our sales manager Charles Chartrand made everything easy, no stress, no high pressure. A delightfull experience. The service department is exceptional.

A heartfelt expression of gratitude to Charles Chartrand and the team at Volkswagen Ste-Agathe. From the moment we walked in, their dedication to ensuring a stress-free experience was evident.

Charles Chartrand and his team didn't just meet our expectations; they exceeded them in every possible way. Their depth of knowledge about the vehicles, coupled with their unwavering professionalism, made every interaction a delight.

It's rare to find such a level of personalized attention and genuine care in the automotive industry, and we feel incredibly fortunate to have experienced it at Volkswagen Ste-Agathe.

If you're in the market for a new or used vehicle, we wholeheartedly recommend reaching out to Charles Chartrand and the team. Trust us, it'll be the best decision you make in your car-buying journey. Thank you once again for making this experience memorable and enjoyable.

I was looking for a VW Tiguan but everything in the MTL area was gone. I fell over this dealership that had one to offer. I made an appointment for a test drive. Charles took great care of me through the entire process. Very professional and hassle free. I have the car for a week now and it's been great so far. I would definitely recommend this dealership. Every employee was very friendly hand helpful. Great service, great experience, thank you!

From A to Z a positive and personalized experience. A very special thank you to Charles Chartrand. His knowledge, patience and honesty made for a very personalized and pleasurable experience. From the moment I stepped through the doors, I was taken care of. I never felt rushed or pressured. Charles took the time to answer all my questions and was straightforward and honest at every turn in the process. He made the daunting task of changing for a first electric vehicle much less stressful. Thank you for your guidance, knowledge, patience and professionalism. I will not hesitate to suggest Volkswagen Sainte Agathe, and in particular Charles. Very pleased with my new Id4. Thank you!

reviews.text:
Tiguan Comfortline 2024
Client since september 2024. Miss Cassandre Lapointe was my 1st contact person. Very professional lady, with great customer care attitude and always helpful. She recently tackled one issue I've had with care and made sure to handle everything till the end.

Keep the spirit ✨️ along with wonderful products we also need good customer service and aftersale attention.

I will not be purchasing another Volkswagen in the future. They gave me an appointment for a car inspection three months from now. I was told over the phone that’s the best they can do. Mind you, they told me the inspection takes only 30 minutes. My car has an urgent issue that must be resolved immediately. I cannot wait three months. I am disgusted by this lack of service and apathy. Once they sell you a car they don’t care what happens after. Also, I had filled out the service request on their website and was told someone would call me to schedule the appointment. One month later, nobody called me despite being promised that, so I had to call the dealership myself. No explanation or apology was provided, as you can imagine. Do yourself a favour and avoid this place if you can.

My encounter with manager Mr. Mikael was incredibly disappointing. His lack of professionalism was evident through dismissive behavior and a clear focus on sales rather than addressing my concerns. Communication was extremely poor, with promises conveniently forgotten. The car they presented had a defect not disclosed in their advertisement, and they insisted I pay an additional $4,000 to fix it beyond the advertised price. This experience with Volkswagen, a reputed brand, was shockingly poor in terms of customer service. I strongly advise others to reconsider visiting this dealership and would actually recommend avoiding it altogether to prevent potential scams. A formal complaint has also been launched with Volkswagen.

I had my VW Rabbit in for repairs this past week (October 2nd, 2024) and dealt with Dexter Ryan Esguerra.  Dexter was very courteous and professional from beginning to end of repairs.  Dexter practices active listening so that he can fully understand the client's needs and concerns.  He displayed excellent client service skills and made the whole experience reassuring and satisfying.  Keep up the great attitude and be proud of the care you provide your clients.

I recently purchased a Jetta GLI from Fritz at this dealership, and the whole experience was amazing. The staff is polite, welcoming, and professional. My salesman, Fritz, was excellent. He was transparent, kind, and went above and beyond to make sure I was happy and comfortable with my purchase. Unlike other places, not once did I feel pressured to make a decision. It genuinely felt like my satisfaction was the priority.

It’s clear that Complexe Volkswagen 440 cares about their customers, and I recommend it to anyone looking for a smooth, fast and enjoyable experience!

reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with Danny Blondin when leasing my new vehicle, and I can confidently say that this was the best experience I've ever had.

What stood out the most was his honesty—there was no pressure, no gimmicks, just straightforward advice.

It's rare to find someone so dedicated to customer satisfaction in the car sales industry, but Danny truly stands out as an example of professionalism and integrity.

If you're in the market for a car, I highly recommend reaching out to Danny. Thanks again for making the experience so smooth and enjoyable!

Danny was great to deal with!! We found a beetle online at the dealership, texted with Danny, had the car picked up by a shipping company and brought to Ontario. The transaction was fast, easy and I love my new bug, now we have 2!!! Highly recommend Danny and this dealership to find your new car.
Very smooth and professional experience from Danny on helping me purchase a Golf R.

A real nightmare they estimated the repairs at over 16k for repairs for a new motor and turbo.We were without a car for 105 days in total…We ended up going to another garage that specializes in Volkswagen cars and well make a long story short within 2h30 hours our car was repaired It end up totalling in at 350$.
Be Careful!!!!!!!!!
Super service.

Cheers to him and the HR department!
Cool Volkswagen dealer. Friendly secretary greeted me. Very big parking lot with lots of cars to choose from.

I visited one other VW dealership Prior to coming to this dealership & I had a terrible treatment , I was kind of expecting the same treatment but it turned out to be a fantastic experience, their staff went way out of their way to accommodate my purchase especially the sale associate ( Mehdi ) who showed up on the delivery day even though it was his day off , if i need to acquire a vehicle in the near future this dealership would be my place to go . I really thank all the staff I enteracted with in this pleasant experience .
Service is very good at this dealer.  Melissa is absolutely wonderful.  She always follows up with my concerns and is truly honest and nice.

This  dealer goes above and beyond each time myself or a family member needs help or  repairs,,
just maintenance, tire change or advice. Always looking to find ways to help and give a little extra care! I truly recommend this dealer! I have full confidence the work is done right and that my vehicle is tip top shape! Great staff!
